verbose_text: Nevertheless, to look at this directly in the human cell lines used in these assays, we examined the mRNA levels of the core cohesin genes SMC1A, SMC3, SA1 (STAG1), SA2 (STAG2), and RAD21 in siBAF180 treated 1BR hTERT cells and the stable shBAF180 U2OS cells, and compared them with controls using quantitative RT-PCR (qRT-PCR).
evidence: levels of the core cohesin genes SMC1A
